description: This Dart source file defines a theming configuration for a Flutter application. It specifies color schemes, typography styles using Google Fonts, and theme components such as AppBar, Card, NavigationBar, Buttons, Chips, Divider, and ListTile to ensure a cohesive visual design and accessibility across the app.

classes.name: AppColors
classes.description: A class encapsulating defined color constants used throughout the app's theme, including primary, secondary, accent, and neutral colors derived from specific hues for a spiritual and neutral palette.

methods.name: buildAppTheme
methods.description: Constructs and returns a Flutter ThemeData object configured for a Material 3 design, integrating custom color palette, typography with Google Fonts, shape styles, and component themes to create a consistent and accessible visual style for the app.
